title: Arnold Palmer Invitational: Viktor Hovland leads Rory McIlory by two strokes

sentence: It was a day for the streetfighters, therefore, so no surprise to see Graeme McDowell shoot 69 to move up 23 places to stand alongside McIlroy, while Matt Fitzpatrick shot 70 to be inside the top ten.
author: Derek Lawrenson Golf Correspondent At Bay Hill
title: DEREK LAWRENSON AT BAY HILL: It has been the year of the underdog at the PGA Tour this season with Talor Gooch and Billy Horschel leading the way, and Rory McIlroy, Viktor Hovland and Brit Tyrrell Hatton struggling to deliver

sentence: Poulter’s chances were already slim after an opening loss at Austin Country Club and a 4 and 2 defeat to Ryder Cup team-mate Matt Fitzpatrick confirmed that he will miss the Masters for just the third time since his debut in 2004.
author: Phil Casey
title: Seamus Power set for Masters debut but misery for Ian Poulter and Paul Casey
